title: Mend: Being the Man She Needs
description: In Mend: Being the Man She Needs, David Green presents readers with clear, practical, and heartfelt guidance on how to create and sustain healthy romantic relationships. By exploring the common root causes of dissension and discord between men and women, Green gets to the heart of the matter, facilitating lasting growth and changing relationships for the better. Green, a seasoned pastoral counselor with a pragmatic, nonreligious, and candid writing style, shares insights gained from years of counseling experience and wisdom from his own marriage. With a multifaceted approach and covering topics such as the importance of emotional intimacy for a healthy sex life, the sharing of household responsibilities, keeping the romantic spark alive, and strategies for resolving conflict, Mend offers insight and guidance for menâ€”written by a man. Mend also delves into the topic of blended families and provides helpful guidelines for creating healthy relationships with stepchildren and extended family members. An invaluable resource for any man who wants to better understand and love the woman in his life, Mend can help heal past hurts in your relationship and strengthen it against future challenges.
author: David               Green
